title: It's different today
creator_credit: David E. Barrow, Peter Johnson, Film Australia and Motion Picture Associates
brief_description: This is a general recruiting film for the Royal Australina Navy. A young seaman waiting to join his ship is regaled by an old sailor with a discussion on ‘how things used to be when I was young’ intercut with action shots of navy manouvres and training exercises.
creator_credit_for_label: David E. Barrow, Peter Johnson, Film Australia and Motion Picture Associates
